meanings.sent2: The infrequence of family gatherings makes them even more special.
meanings.sent3: The infrequence of sunny days in this city is almost comical.
meanings.sent4: Her infrequence in attending meetings is like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The infrequence of shooting stars makes each sighting magical.

meanings.definition: The act of occurring rarely or seldom.
meanings.sent1: I appreciate the infrequence of power outages in our area.
meanings.sent2: The infrequence of train delays is a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent3: The infrequence of his jokes makes them even funnier.
meanings.sent4: The infrequence of her smiles is like a hidden treasure.
